item.name: Remap F19 to Control_R + Option_R + Command_R + Shift_R
item.appendix: This creates a fake extra modifier key. Use Seil to map CapsLock to F19.

item.name: Control_R + Option_R + Command_R + Shift_R + H/J/K/L to Left/Up/Down/Right
item.appendix: F19 should be remapped to those four modifiers, CapsLock to F19 for convenience.
